downloadDescription: This documentation describes how to use Web Services for Microsoft Dynamics GP, which you can use to build database integrations.
detailsSection:
You can use this page to download the following documentation components.

  • Web Service Installation and Administration Guide (WSlnstallAdminGuide.pdf): Describes how to install and configure the web services, and includes maintenance and troubleshooting information.
  • Web Service Programmer's Guide (WSProgrammersGuide.pdf): Describes how to write code that uses the Microsoft Dynamics GP web services. Also includes information about the sample applications that are included with the Web Services SDK installation.
  • Web Service Reference (DynamicsGPWebServiceRef.chm): Contains reference information for all of the methods, classes, enumerations, policy objects, and interfaces in the Dynamics GP web service.
systemRequirementsSection: • To view the PDF files, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manuals or help.
  2. Save the file to your computer.

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Dynamics GP Developer Center on MSDN
